author: kpedro88
body:
I've found the existing test config [CondTools/Hcal/test/dumpHcalCond_cfg.py](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/CMSSW_9_0_X/CondTools/Hcal/test/dumpHcalCond_cfg.py) somewhat tedious to use when trying to compare various sets of HCAL conditions.

I made a command-line configurable script which can grab any condition from any source (GT, DB record, SQL file, ascii, hardcode). It is self-documenting with a custom help message using the `info` parameter. A few elements had to be re-implemented for this context (grabbing correct geometry, appending an arbitrary command e.g. to set hardcode condition options, dumping the state of the process because `edmConfigDump` doesn't allow command-line arguments to the config).

This new script is submitted as a separate version by request of HCAL DB experts.

attn: @abdoulline, @mazarkin, @walterjr
title: new version of dumpHcalCond_cfg
